title: Scientists rejuvenate stem cells in the aging brain of mice

title_detail.value: Scientists rejuvenate stem cells in the aging brain of mice

summary: Scientists have been able to rejuvenate stem cells in the brain of aging mice. The revitalized stem cells improve the regeneration of injured or diseased areas in the brain of old mice. The researchers expect that their approach will provide fresh impetus in regenerative medicine and facilitate the development of stem cell therapies.
